========
comments
========

# anything else here should be ignored

---

(program (comment))

===================
empty block comment
===================

=begin
=end

---

(program (comment))

======================
one-line block comment
======================

=begin
whatever
=end

---

(program (comment))

=========================
multi-line block comments
=========================

=begin
whatever
multiple lines of whatever
=end

---

(program (comment))
